sense.gloss: bead (of sweat, dew, etc.), drop, droplet
gem, jewel (esp. spherical; sometimes used figuratively), pearl
person (when commenting on their nature), character
item, funds or person used as part of a plot
alcohol with liquor added (esp. wine-based shōchū highball, also beer with whiskey)
ohajiki, traditional Japanese children's game similar to marbles, played with coin-shaped pieces made of coloured glass or plastic
to flip, to snap, to flick
to strum, to pluck the strings (of a guitar, etc.)
to play (a stringed or keyboard instrument)
counter for parts, stages, installments, etc. (of a story, series, project, campaign, etc.)

sdata.j: ↑警察↑↓けいさつ↓はあなたに↑弾丸↑↓だんがん↓をみつけさせるでしょう。
sdata.e: The police will get you to find the bullets.

sdata.j: ↑彼↑↓かれ↓はピアノを↑上手↑↓じょうず↓に↑弾↑↓ひ↓く。
sdata.e: He plays the piano very well.

sdata.j: ↑彼↑↓かれ↓はピアノをとても↑上手↑↓じょうず↓に↑弾↑↓ひ↓く。
sdata.e: He plays the piano very well.

sdata.j: ↑彼↑↓かれ↓はたいへん↑上手↑↓じょうず↓にピアノを↑弾↑↓ひ↓く。
sdata.e: He plays the piano very well.

sdata.j: ↑空港↑↓くうこう↓で↑時限↑↓じげん↓↑爆弾↑↓ばくだん↓が↑爆発↑↓ばくはつ↓し↑１３↑↓じゅうさん↓↑名↑↓めい↓もの↑命↑↓いのち↓を↑奪↑↓うば↓った。
sdata.e: A time bomb went off in the airport killing thirteen people.

sdata.j: ↑凶漢↑↓きょうかん↓が↑王↑↓おう↓の↑馬車↑↓ばしゃ↓に↑爆弾↑↓ばくだん↓を↑投↑↓な↓げつけた。
sdata.e: A fanatic threw a bomb at the king's coach.

sdata.j: ↑学生↑↓がくせい↓の↑中↑↓なか↓にはギターを↑弾↑↓ひ↓くのが↑好↑↓す↓きなものもいる。
sdata.e: Some of the students like to play the guitar.

sdata.j: ↑科学↑↓かがく↓が↑原子↑↓げんし↓↑爆弾↑↓ばくだん↓を↑生↑↓う↓み↑出↑↓だ↓した。
↑一↑↓いち↓↑年↑↓ねん↓↑練習↑↓れんしゅう↓して、↑彼女↑↓かのじょ↓はどうにかピアノを↑弾↑↓ひ↓いている。
sdata.e: After a year's practice, she plays the piano after a fashion.

sdata.j: ロンドンの↑警察↑↓けいさつ↓はいつも↑電車↑↓でんしゃ↓や↑地下鉄↑↓ちかてつ↓の↑爆弾↑↓ばくだん↓を↑探↑↓さが↓し↑出↑↓だ↓すのに↑躍起↑↓やっき↓となっている。
sdata.e: In London, the police are always worried about finding a bomb on the train or subway.
